abstract: Ugandan troops move against Charles Wesley Mumbere, king of Bakonzo people, in Ruwenzori region, increasing conflict between security forces and armed rebels; some of Mumbere's supporters have called for Ruwenzori to secede.

headline.print_headline: Ugandan Troops Move Against Tribal King in Rebel Region
headline.main: Ugandan Troops Move Against Tribal King in Rebel Region

snippet: Security forces clashed with palace guards and removed the leader of the Bakonzo people, a vocal critic of President Yoweri Museveni....
lead_paragraph: Security forces clashed with palace guards and removed the leader of the Bakonzo people, a vocal critic of President Yoweri Museveni.
